data.author: Christian Rauch
data.message:
fix targets (#34)

* remove unused 'ament_cmake_ros'

* fix linked targets and replace deprecated 'ament_target_dependencies'

data.author: Alex Navarro
data.message:
Add open3d::geometry::Image <-> sensor_msgs::msg::Image conversions (#31)

* Added conversion between open3d image and sensor_msgs image

* Added camera info conversions and move conversions

* Updated README for image conversions

* Formatting changes after running ament_cpplint and ament_uncrustify

* Switched to using rcpputils for checking endianness

* Fixed spacing errors

* Added endianness correction moving from ros to open3d image

* Added test cases for image conversions

* Removed frame_id inputs from all functions

* Filled in copyright statement comment lines to fix failing copyright test

* Adjusted comments to account for the fact that frame_id is no longer used

* Added doxyfile and readme

* added eigen

* added maintainer

* set initial version

* update cmake version

* switched indentation style to 2 spaces

* Modified contacts

Removed contact SteveMacenski

* removed basic instructions

* removed open3d setup instructions

* Added repository level readme

* Added license headers to source files

As per best practices by [the Apache Foundation]( https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)

* Added university name and contributors list  for proper attribution
